rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 2 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 2:06 PM, 19 June 2025(Thursday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Tarlac, Zambales, Rizal, Metro Manila, Cavite, Batangas and Laguna within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Bulacan(San Miguel, Plaridel, Pandi, Santa Maria), Pampanga(Candaba), Nueva Ecija(Cabiao) and Quezon(Padre Burgos, Pagbilao) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
